lines:
I samary, 2000,

Mr. Bo 5. Kwani

Cambridge, Mass 
by Agar Kwanini

I have your letter this morning, signed by you and taik, and 
I engless checks for ten dobiera sath, as raguastad. Good luck to you 
both, and the happiest kind of a New Year,

I have received a number of bilis since you 2022 unich I have 
not felt justified in paying until I said talk, then over with you. I 
Suppose you will be out again in a day or two, and hence I shall wait 
until that time.

Singurely yours,

Principai

Two ansiosures
raw: I samary, 2000, Mr. Bo 5. Kwani Cambridge, Mass by Agar Kwanini I have your letter this morning, signed by you and taik, and I engless checks for ten dobiera sath, as raguastad. Good luck to you both, and the happiest kind of a New Year, I have received a number of bilis since you 2022 unich I have not felt justified in paying until I said talk, then over with you. I Suppose you will be out again in a day or two, and hence I shall wait until that time. Singurely yours, Principai Two ansiosures

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing the $10 for S.S. Kwan and S.C. Luk in response to their postcard. Stearns requests a meeting after the New year to discuss authorizing bills received.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
